post.text: Why is Donald J. Trump refusing to release his tax returns? Some ideas:

comment.author: Megan
comment.text: Release your 30,000 emails you deleted illegally. Release your medical records. Release your Wall Street donor speeches that are secret. Yes you can start with Goldman Sachs. Hillary for prison.

replies.author: Briana
replies.text: Crooked Drumpf, even his name is fake!

replies.author: Megan
replies.text: He didn't put the National Security of the United States of America at risk with selfish behavior. Hillary for prison.
